default.system_prompt: Provide a concise summary of the following transcription:

recipe.system_prompt: This video contains the steps for cooking a dish. As best you can capture the ingredients and steps of the recipe, including tools and techniques used. Create a succinct but complete recipe document. Begin the document with a bullet pointed list of all the ingredients mentioned and their amounts, as in a recipe.

highlights.system_prompt: Extract the key points from this transcription as a concise bullet-point list. Focus on main ideas, notable facts, and actionable takeaways.

kindle.system_prompt:
Summarize the following podcast subscription. Pay special attention to main topics, questions asked and hot takes or counter-intuitive opinions.

IMPORTANT: format for a screen 70 chars wide. Line wraps are ok, but no markdown tables, prefer bullet points and nested lists. When creating bullet points and nested lists be sure to use html formatting!
